name: Uzumaki Naruto
description: Using his signature move, Shadow Clones, Naruto is able to perform powerful moves such as the Uzumaki Naruto Combo and Rasengan.

skills.name: Shadow Clones
skills.description: Naruto makes mutliple shadow clones hiding his true body. During this time, all damage done to Naruto has a 50 percent reduction. This effect lasts 4 rounds.

skills.name: Uzumaki Naruto Combo
skills.description: Deals 30 damage to a single opponent. Requires Shadow clones.

skills.name: Rasengan
skills.description: Deals 45 damage to a single opponent, and the target is unable to perform a skill for 1 round. Requires Shadow Clones.

skills.name: Sexy Technique
skills.description: Makes Uzumaki Naruto invulnerable for the next round.

name: Haruno Sakura
description: Due to her recent training as a medical ninja with Tsunade, Sakura is now able to deliver powerful punches and heal her teammates.

skills.name: Rampage
skills.description: Sakura goes on a rampage, improving her K.O. Punch by 200 percent and taking 50 percent less damage for the upcoming 5 rounds.

skills.name: KO Punch
skills.description: Deals 15 damage and knocks the target unconscious leaving the target unable to perform a skill for 1 round.

skills.name: Cure
skills.description: Sakura cures a teammember for 30 health points.

skills.name: Sakura Replacement Technique
skills.description: Makes Haruno Sakura invulnerable for the next round.

name: Uchiha Sasuke
description: The sole survivor of the Uchiha clan massacre. Using his sharingan, Sasuke is able to anticipate incoming attacks and is capable of advanced offensive moves.

skills.name: Sasuke Replacement Technique
skills.description: Makes Uchiha Sasuke invulnerable for the next round.

skills.name: Sharingan
skills.description: Sasuke activates his sharingan, all damage versus Sasuke is reduced by 50 percent. Lasts 4 rounds.

skills.name: Chidori
skills.description: Deals 60 damage to the target. Requires sharingan to perform.

name: Haku
description: Haku is the sole survivor of his clan and is the subordinate of Momochi Zabuza. His bloodline ability allows him to potentially disable and attack all his enemies.

skills.name: Water Needles
skills.description: Deals 30 damage to the target(s). This skill becomes area of effect when Demonic Ice Mirrors is activated.

skills.name: Acupuncture
skills.description: Puts the target(s) in a coma leaving the target(s) unable to perform a skill for 2 rounds. This skill becomes area of effect when Demonic Ice Mirrors is activated.

skills.name: Demonic Ice Mirrors
skills.description: Haku creates Demonic Ice Mirrors for 3 rounds. During this time, Water Needles and Acupuncture become area of effect and Haku becomes invulnerable.

skills.name: Mirror Transfer
skills.description: Makes Shiro Haku invulnerable for the next round.

name: Rock Lee
description: Lee is a Taijutsu specialist. Under the study of Maito Gai he has learned how to open his chakra gates, vastly increasing the strength of his lotus technique.

skills.name: Drunken Fist Style Taijutsu
skills.description: Starting this turn, Lee deals 45 damage to a single opponent over three rounds. During this time, all damage done to Lee is reduced by 66 percent.

skills.name: 5th Gate Opening
skills.description: Improves lotus to a total of 400 percent damage, and makes Lee invulnerable for the upcoming two rounds. Lee looses 80 percent of his current health.

skills.name: Lotus
skills.description: Deals 30 damage to an opponent (Please note that this skill does 120 damage when 5th Gate Opening is in effect).

skills.name: Evasion
skills.description: Makes Rock Lee invulnerable for the next round.

name: Tenten
description: Tenten is a true weapon master. Within seconds, she can throw hundreds of projectiles at one or more targets without a single miss.

skills.name: Summoning Twin Rising Dragons
skills.description: Tenten prepares for her attacks. Lasts 5 rounds.

skills.name: Twin Rising Dragons
skills.description: Deals 30 damage to all enemy targets. Requires Summoning Twin Rising Dragons.

skills.name: Twin Rising Dragons Trap
skills.description: Traps the entire enemy team for one round and damages the team for 5 damage. Requires Summoning Twin Rising Dragons.

skills.name: Tenten Replacement Technique
skills.description: Makes Tenten invulnerable for the next round.

name: Hyuuga Neji
description: Neji is the most talented member of the Hyuuga clan. Being a super genius, he was able to master his Byakugan and the fighting style Gentle Fist all by himself.

skills.name: Gentle Fist Taijutsu
skills.description: Neji attacks his opponent for 2 rounds, dealing 20 damage per round.

skills.name: Eight Trigram Palms Heavenly Spin
skills.description: This skill deals 15 damage to all enemies and makes Hyuuga Neji invulnerable for one round.

skills.name: Eight Trigram Sixty-Four Palms Technique
skills.description: Neji closes all of his opponents chakra points. The target loses 5 chakra and is unable to defend for one round.

skills.name: Neji Replacement Technique
skills.description: Makes Hyuuga Neji invulnerable for the next round.

name: Gaara of the Desert
description: Gaara has the demon Shukaku within him, which enables him to use sand for fighting. This sand can either form an ultimate defence or kill an opponent instantly.

skills.name: Armor of Sand
skills.description: Gaara activates his armor of sand, all damage versus Gaara is reduced by 75 percent. Lasts 5 rounds.

skills.name: Desert Coffin
skills.description: When the target is in Desert Coffin, he is unable to defend or use a skill for two round. Desert Coffin enables Desert Graveyard on the target.

skills.name: Desert Graveyard
skills.description: Instantly kills the target. Requires Desert Coffin on this target.

skills.name: Sand Shield
skills.description: Makes Gaara of the Desert invulnerable for the next round.

name: Inuzuka Kiba
description: Kiba is a member of the Inuzuka clan, which uses dogs in battle. He can fuse with his dog Akamaru to become extremely powerful.

skills.name: Dynamic Air marking
skills.description: Kiba marks all enemies, enabling Double Headed Wolf. Air marking lasts 5 rounds.

skills.name: Double Headed Wolf
skills.description: Deals 60 damage to all marked opponents and heals 15 health over three rounds. Kiba cannot be attacked during this time.

skills.name: Garouga
skills.description: Deals 30 damage to a single opponent. When Double Headed Wolf is in effect, Garouga deals 60 damage. Can only target enemies who are marked.

skills.name: Smokebomb
skills.description: Makes Kiba invulnerable for the next round.

name: Hyuuga Hinata
description: Hinata is a shy girl that doubts her own powers and potential. Only recently, she developed a new fighting style that involves extremely precise chakra control.

skills.name: Gentle Fist
skills.description: Hinata attacks a single target for 2 rounds, dealing 20 damage and removing 2 chakra per round. Requires Byakugan.

skills.name: Byakugan
skills.description: Enables Hinata to use her techniques. The effect lasts 5 rounds.

skills.name: Attack of the Eight Trigrams Sixty-Four Palms
skills.description: Deals 25 damage to all enemy targets. During the next round, all damage done to your team is reduced by 50 percent. Requires Byakugan.

skills.name: Protection of the Eight Trigrams Sixty-Four Palms
skills.description: Makes Hinata invulnerable during the next round.

name: Aburame Shino
description: Shino is the successor of the Aburame clan, which uses bugs for fighting. These bugs can be used to leach chakra or defend the entire team.

skills.name: Chakra Leach
skills.description: Shino uses his bugs to steal chakra from the enemy. Every target that has a bug on him/her gets 10 damage and 1 chakra drained.

skills.name: Bug Clone
skills.description: Makes Aburame Shino invulnerable for the next round.

skills.name: Female Bug
skills.description: Place a bug on single enemy target.

skills.name: Bug Wall
skills.description: The whole team becomes invulnerable for the upcoming 2 rounds.

name: Kankuro
description: Kankuro is a master puppeteer, and uses only puppets for fighting. His puppets can deal damage as well as poison enemies.

skills.name: Puppet Replacement Technique
skills.description: Makes Kankuro invulnerable for the next round.

skills.name: Puppet Preparation
skills.description: Kankuro prepares his puppets for attack. Lasts 5 rounds.

skills.name: Poison Bomb
skills.description: Requires Puppet Preparation. Deals 40 damage to all opponents over 4 rounds. This damage cannot be defended against once in effect.

skills.name: Black Secret Technique Machine One Shot
skills.description: Deals 60 damage to the target. Requires Puppet Preparation.

name: Nara Shikamaru
description: Shikamaru is the smartest ninja in Konoha. As a member of the Nara clan, he can control shadows and use them to capture and damage the enemy.

skills.name: Meditate
skills.description: Shikamaru thinks up a strategy. The tecnique stays active for 4 rounds.

skills.name: Shadow Bind
skills.description: Captures the enemy team making them unable to perform a skill for two rounds and boosts the damage of Neck Bind by 100 percent. Requires Meditate.

skills.name: Shadow Neck Bind
skills.description: Deals 30 damage to a single opponent and disables their defence. Requires Meditate.

skills.name: Shikamaru Replacement Technique
skills.description: Makes Shikamaru invulnerable for the next round.

name: Yamanaka Ino
description: Ino, as a member of the Yamanaka clan, can control the minds of others. She can either enter minds, or control a persons movements.

name: Akimichi Chouji
description: Chouji is a member of the Akimichi clan. With his clans special food pills and multi-size techniques, he can do some serious damage.

skills.name: Chouji Replacement Technique
skills.description: Makes Chouji invulnerable to damage for this round.

skills.name: Akimichi Pills
skills.description: Boosts Chouji his attacks with 100 percent damage for the rest of the game. Chouji receives 20 damage for each pill taken. Three pills can be taken max.

skills.name: Meat Tank
skills.description: Chouji transforms into a Meat Tank for 2 rounds, attacking a single opponent dealing 10 damage each round. During this time, Chouji is invulnerable to damage.

name: Temari
description: Temari is the elder sister of Gaara and Kankuro. She uses a giant fan as her main weapon to do powerful long ranged attacks.

skills.name: Cutting Whirlwind
skills.description: Deals 25 damage to all enemy targets.

skills.name: Dust Wind
skills.description: The whole team becomes invulnerable for the upcoming 2 rounds.

skills.name: Summoning Quick Beheading Dance
skills.description: Deals 35 damage to all enemy targets.

skills.name: Fan Defence Technique
skills.description: Makes Temari invulnerable for the next round.

name: Jiroubou
description: Jiroubou is a fat member of the Sound four. His fighting style is called Achiever of Nirvana Fist, which involves powerful physical attacks.

name: Kidoumaru
description: Kidoumarus skills are spider-like. He has 6 arms and has the ability to create webs and weapons with a strange golden liquid.

name: Tayuya
description: Tayuyas only weapon is a flute, on which she can cast Genjutsu or control three summoned demons, The Doki.

name: Sakon
description: Sakon usually carries a strange head around on his back. This head turns out to be his brother Ukon, who can also exit Sakon and enter other bodies in order to destroy them.

name: Kaguya Kimimaru
description: Kimimaro is the last of the Kaguya clan. He has an extremely strong skeleton frame, and can manipulate his bones in any way he likes.

name: Yakushi Kabuto
description: Kabuto was once found on the battlefield by a Konoha medical nin. He was taught medical ninjutsu, and now assists Orochimaru to aid him in his experiments.

name: Shizune
description: In addition to medical Ninjutsu, Shizune uses various poisonous attacks capacle of stunning the enemy or do repeated damage.

name: Momochi Zabuza
description: Zabuza is a missing-nin from the Hidden mist village. With his water themed jutsu, he is able to trap his opponents or damage them all at once.

name: Maito Gai
description: Gai is the sensei of Lee, Tenten and Neji. He and Lee both use the same fighting style "Strong Fist", which involves high-speed moves and opening of inner chakra gates.

name: Hatake Kakashi
description: Kakashi is the sensei of Naruto, Sakura, and Sasuke. Due to his Sharingan, he is known as "Copy Ninja Kakashi" all over the world.

name: Hoshigaki Kisame
description: Kisame is an S-ranked criminal of the Hidden Village of Mist. He is skilled in water themed jutsu, and can use his sword Samehada to devour chakra.

name: Uchiha Itachi
description: Uchiha Itachi an extremely dangerous criminal, responsible for single-handedly annihilating the entire Uchiha clan, leaving his younger brother Sasuke as the sole survivor.

name: Jiraiya
description: Jiraiya is one of the legendary sannin. With his various frog themed jutsu, he is able to deal a lot of damage and defend the entire team.

name: Tsunade
description: Tsunade is currently the Godaime (fifth) Hokage of Konoha. Her skill with medical Ninjutsu allows her to do insane amounts of damage and heal her teammates.

name: Orochimaru
description: Orochimaru is one of the legendary sannin. Once he was part of the Hidden Leaf village, but his hunger for power made him one of the most wanted criminals alive.

name: Sandaime Hokage
description: Sandaime was the strongest Kage that ever lived. He fully mastered the way of the ninja and knew over a thousand jutsu, including the one that sealed the Nine Tails.
